author: TruthGundlach
content: 30Y UST at its lowest yield ever is being touted as a “buy” about as loudly as the 10Y was July 6, 2016 when its yield troughed at 1.32%.

author: TruthGundlach
content: Way back, when the world was young, 30Y USTs were given the moniker “certificates of confiscation”. That was darned near the 30Y yield peak.
